data.title: Always a great breakfast
data.text: It had been a while since I had been to Waffle Barn but nothing has changed. The food is still great and the service is great with a smile. Always get plenty to eat and I have never had a bad meal there.

data.title: Weekday Bfast!
data.text: Stopped in for quick breakfast on a week day & restaurant was busy ! Lots of "locals" !! Servers were quite friendly with locals and made us feel welcome - food was plentiful and tasted great ! Prices were cheap for quantity & quality !!!

data.title: Place to remember
data.text: My dad and I have been going here for years! I grew up going to work with my dad he would go here every morning before work and have his coffee and breakfast.

data.title: Good Old Time Food
data.text: The staff is friendly, and the food is good old truck stop style food. I have eaten there many times, and have no complaints. There's nothing fancy about it, but it seems to be reasonably clean, and their "specials" are a good value. They also have a senior menu.

data.title: Breakfast Omlette
data.text: My husband and I were on our way to Yuba College in Marysville and found Waffle barn right off hwy 20.  To our surprise the food was wonderful and priced right.  That was 3 years ago and have now moved into Yuba City and are regular customers.  Try the Santa Fe omlette it's the bomb.

data.title: Breakfast gone slow.
data.text: We went on a weekday morning, they were fairly busy. We were seated all the way out in a corner, so we hardly ever got checked on. Food took a long time to come out, most likely because it took them more than 10 min to take our order, even though we had been ready to order in a while. The food itself was good, which is why it got the extra star. We had been finished with our food for more than 10 min before it was cleared and we got the check. We ran out of drinks during eating that no one came to check on. Horrible experience,  just go to the Roseville one. Might be a drive, but at least they'll take care of you there. And I understand that sometimes places are undermanned, but if we had been told that I would have been a lot more ok with all this.

data.title: the big skillet
data.text: my husband got the free big skillet for eating the majority of it and then was sick the rest of day lol  he had fun up until then lol

data.title: Good Old Style Eats!
data.text: After driving bye it for 3 days we stopped and Had Breakfast. The Service was great! Nice and Clean and The Food was really Good and Hot! I'll be Back for sure!

data.title: Just on the Average
data.text: The service was satisfactory. The food was just ok. No too bad on the cost. Since there is not alot of choices for good eats in Yuba City, the Waffle Barn is a bit more attractive. But only since there is no where else to go that is worth a darn.

data.title: Acceptable everything, but not going the extra mile
data.text: My wife is a full vegetarian and when trying to adapt my wife food needs, appeared that waitress could not adapt to the customer's needs.  Rather disappointing as most other local restaurant are not only capable of adapting they appear to be glad to assist.

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: Good choice for breakfast and lunch. Service has always been good and they have nice options on the menu. Breakfast and lunch specials as well. The parking lot needs tome TLC and the inside as well but it is clean. So if you want good food served by a great staff in a cute but dated decor then this is the place for you.

data.title: Cute decor
data.text: Waffle Barn is a good place to eat for breakfasts and lunch they close at 2. . My only problem with the place is it's in need of a major revamp. The rugs and the bathroom is sooo outdated. But the service and the food is good. I had a Swiss bacon burger. It was delicious. When I went there in the past it was always breakfast and the food was good then too. So give the place a try. Because the food is good

data.title: Waffle Barn
data.text: I love going to the waffle barn for breakfast. The staff has always been nice even in busy times. You are seated very quickly and your order comes within 5 minutes. Their food is superb. I have been a regular customer for the last 5 years. I recommend going there for breakfast or lunch.

data.title: Great waffles
data.text: The Waffle Barn is a nice, clean place to have a great waffle for breakfast. The service is very good and fast. Try a plain waffle so that the outer surface stays crisp and the inner part is light and moist. The #3 combo plate was served with two eggs and four pieces of sausage (you can get bacon if you prefer). Would definitely go back if in the area.

data.title: Staff is super friendly, food is good!
data.text: As a local I have only been here a handful of times, but I never regret going. The food is good, the staff is always friendly and while the place is a bit worn, its always worth it. The funny thing is, every time Ive been here has been when friends come to town! This is the best place for breakfast, especially if going with children.

data.title: Food is ok
data.text: The parking lot is terrible !!! A lot pot holes!!!Also entire place needs a paint! Interior needs some help also. Good servers!

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Absolutely the best breakfast in town! We enjoyed it everyday we visited Yuba City. The biscuits and gravy are awesome. The variety of waffles make it hard to decide!

data.title: Good food prepared fast
data.text: This restaurant is a good place for breakfast or lunch. They have daily specials and a friendly staff. If you order lunch it comes with a free dessert which is a nice touch. It's a good value for what you get, the portions are generous and tasty. The decor needs an update though.

data.title: Good breakfast
data.text: Eat there often but may stop since certain staff see to have issues with minorities as of late. Notic twice a cool reception and poor service when friends joined me that were minority's

data.title: Good (almost great) all round!
data.text: As I said, on the menu, taste, service and value, Waffle Barn is heading toward being great, not just good. The options are wide and from what I've seen and experienced, well prepared with great portion sizes. The staff are mostly very friendly and attentive - occasionally one or two let it be known, last night did not go well for them.
